messages.subject: Books Sold.  Kozuka still needed.
messages.msgSnippet: The Wakayama Set has Sold. However, I am still looking for a good quality iron Kozuka to complete a higo koshirae.  Kozuka should measure between 1.4 and 1.5
messages.messageBody:
The Wakayama Set has Sold.
However, I am still looking for a good quality iron Kozuka to complete
a higo koshirae. Kozuka should measure between 1.4 and 1.5 cm wide.
Please contact me off list if you have something that may fit the bill.
Thanks
Kirk
